#summary Forward a video mail to a friend

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_guest


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||vmail_id||string||Vmail ID of the recorded message that is being sent.||
|| ||senderJabberId||jid||Jabber ID of the VMail sender.||
||*optional*||tokboxRecipients||string||Comma separated string of TokBox User IDs who will receive the VMail.||
|| ||emailRecipients||string||Comma separated string of valid email addresses who will receive the VMail.||
|| ||text||string||Text component of the VMail message.||
</table>

==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||401||UnauthorizedUserException||You are not authorized to make requests as jabberid ###. Authorized as ####.||
||500||SerializableException||Vmail was unable to be sent||
</table>

==Notes==
  * While both {TOKBOXRECIPIENTS} and {EMAILRECIPIENTS} are optional, one or the other must have at least one value or the Video Mail will fail to send.
